title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.5 - Prepaid registrations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.5 - Prepaid registrations

State Regulations
(a) A dealer who wishes to issue prepaid
registrations must obtain prepaid registrations from the
commissioner. (b) A dealer must pay
$25 in advance for each prepaid registration ordered. (c) A dealer who has prepaid registrations
must sell and issue a prepaid registration to the purchaser of a snowmobile
from that dealer, at the time of sale, unless the purchaser signs a declaration
of exemption from registration, as described in section
107.8
of this Part. This applies
to both resident and nonresident purchasers. (d) A dealer may sell a prepaid registration
to a snowmobile owner from another jurisdiction for $25. When submitting a
registration application for a nonresident, the dealer shall include an
additional $10 fee, payable to the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
107.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
